0.text: Innate: Scoring a champion  takedown within 3 seconds of damaging them reduces the  current cooldowns of Katarina's abilities by 15 seconds.
0.html: Innate: Scoring a champion takedown within 3 seconds of damaging them reduces the  current cooldowns of Katarina's abilities by 15 seconds.
markedPassages: takedown
current cooldowns

1.text: Innate - Sinister Steel: Whenever Katarina retrieves a Dagger, she uses it to slash around herself, dealing 68 − 240 (based on level) (+ 60% bonus AD) (+ 65 / 75 / 85 / 95% (based on level) AP) magic damage to nearby enemies and applying  on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness to enemy  champions hit, as well as reducing  Shunpo's current cooldown by 78 / 84 / 90 / 96% (based on level) of its total cooldown.
1.html: Innate - Sinister Steel: Whenever Katarina retrieves a Dagger, she uses it to slash around herself, dealing 68 − 240 (based on level) (+ 60% bonus AD) (+ 65 / 75 / 85 / 95% (based on level) AP) magic damage to nearby enemies and applying on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness to enemy champions hit, as well as reducing Shunpo's current cooldown by 78 / 84 / 90 / 96% (based on level) of its total cooldown.
markedPassages: (+ 65 / 75 / 85 / 95% (based on level) AP)
on-hit
champions
Shunpo's

2.text: Daggers grant  sight of their radius and will disappear after being on the ground for 4 seconds.
2.html: Daggers grant sight of their radius and will disappear after being on the ground for 4 seconds.
markedPassages: sight

0.text: Active: Katarina throws a Dagger at the target enemy that deals magic damage and can bounce to up to two additional nearby enemies.
0.html: Active: Katarina throws a Dagger at the target enemy that deals magic damage and can bounce to up to two additional nearby enemies.

1.text: The Dagger then lands onto the ground after 1 second, about 350 units opposite from where it struck the first target.
1.html: The Dagger then lands onto the ground after 1 second, about 350 units opposite from where it struck the first target.

2.text: The target does not have to be  visible for the Dagger to bounce to them.
2.html: The target does not have to be visible for the Dagger to bounce to them.
markedPassages: visible
possibleConcerningAbilities: The target does not have to be  visible for the Dagger to bounce to them.

0.text: Active: Katarina tosses a Dagger into the air above her current location and gains  bonus movement speed that decays until it lands after 1.25 seconds, becoming  ghosted for the same duration.
0.html: Active: Katarina tosses a Dagger into the air above her current location and gains  bonus movement speed that decays until it lands after 1.25 seconds, becoming ghosted for the same duration.
markedPassages: bonus movement speed
ghosted

0.text: Active: Katarina  blinks to the target location around the target unit or Dagger, dealing magic damage to the nearest enemy in range and applying  on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness.
0.html: Active: Katarina blinks to the target location around the target unit or Dagger, dealing magic damage to the nearest enemy in range and applying on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness.
markedPassages: blinks
on-hit

1.text: Shunpo  resets Katarina's basic attack timer. Upon blinking, Katarina enters a 0.15-second cast time.
1.html: Shunpo resets Katarina's basic attack timer. Upon blinking, Katarina enters a 0.15-second cast time.
markedPassages: resets
possibleConcerningAbilities: Shunpo  resets Katarina's basic attack timer. Upon blinking, Katarina enters a 0.15-second cast time.

0.text: Active: Katarina  channels for up to 2.5 seconds, rapidly throwing a dagger every 0.166 seconds to up to 3 of the closest nearby enemy champions,  revealing herself in the process.Each dagger deals physical damage and magic damage, applies on-attack and  on-hit (without applying  life steal) effects, and inflicts  Grievous Wounds on the target for 3 seconds.
0.html:
Active: Katarina channels for up to 2.5 seconds, rapidly throwing a dagger every 0.166 seconds to up to 3 of the closest nearby enemy champions, revealing herself in the process.

Each dagger deals physical damage and magic damage, applies on-attack and on-hit (without applying  life steal) effects, and inflicts Grievous Wounds on the target for 3 seconds.

0.content: 18% (+ 30% per 100% bonus attack speed) bonus AD

1.content: 270% (+ 450.009% per 100% bonus attack speed) bonus AD
